metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 7 — COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES/
aws::graph::propositions: Kove Patent Infringement Lawsuit Against Amazon
Kove filed a complaint against Amazon regarding Patent Nos. 7,814,170 and 7,103,640.
Patent Nos. 7,814,170 and 7,103,640 are each entitled "Network Distributed Tracking Wire Transfer Protocol".
Kove filed a complaint against Amazon regarding Patent No. 7,233,978.
Patent No. 7,233,978 is entitled "Method and Apparatus for Managing Location Information in a Network Separate from the Data to Which the Location Information Pertains."
Kove's complaint sought an unspecified amount of damages against Amazon.
Kove's complaint sought enhanced damages against Amazon.
Kove's complaint sought attorneys' fees against Amazon.
Kove's complaint sought costs against Amazon.
Kove's complaint sought interest against Amazon.
Kove's complaint sought injunctive relief against Amazon.
In April 2024, a jury found that Amazon infringed the asserted patents.
In April 2024, a jury awarded Kove $525 million in damages.
In August 2024, the court awarded Kove $148 million in pre-judgment interest.
In September 2024, Amazon filed a notice of appeal.
Amazon disagrees with the jury's findings.
Amazon will continue to defend itself vigorously in this matter.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 7 — COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 7 — COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES/

text: Patent Nos. 7,814,170 and 7,103,640, each entitled “Network Distributed Tracking Wire Transfer Protocol”; and 7,233,978, entitled “Method and Apparatus for Managing Location Information in a Network Separate from the Data to Which the Location Information Pertains.” The complaint sought an unspecified amount of damages, enhanced damages, attorneys’ fees, costs, interest, and injunctive relief. In April 2024, a jury found that Amazon infringed the asserted patents and awarded Kove $ 525 million in damages. In August 2024, the court awarded Kove $ 148 million in pre-judgment interest. In September 2024, we filed a notice of appeal. We disagree with the jury’s findings and will continue to defend ourselves vigorously in this matter.
